properties.name: lendora.security.login.threshold
properties.description: Max login attempts before triggering lockout

properties.name: lendora.security.login.window.minutes
properties.description: Time window in minutes for counting login attempts

properties.name: lendora.security.login.lock.minutes
properties.description: Lockout duration in minutes after threshold exceeded

properties.name: lendora.services.userservice.url
properties.description: Base URL of the User Service
